name: Fractured Quizzyland Categories | Brain Teasers | 20 Questions

questions.explanation:
People.

	Sub-categories include Criminals, Figures from the Art World, and Monarchs and Royalty.

Humanities.

	Sub-categories include Words Within Words and A-Z words under Vocabulary under English.

Brain Teasers.

	Subcategories include Fractured Words, Wordwise, and Word Play.

Sports.

	Subcategories include Canadian Football, Cricket, and Ice Hockey.

Television.

	Subcategories include ER, Friends, Sex in the City, and The West Wing.

World.

	Subcategories range from Airports and Airlines to World Languages.

Video Games.

	Just about any video game that you can think of (barring some of the ultra-violent ones) is listed alphabetically.

For Children.

	Subcategories include Dr. Seuss, Colors for Kids, and Words for Kids.

Literature.

	Subcategories include Jane Austen, the Bronte Sisters, and George Eliot.

Movies.

	Subcategories include Clueless, the Commitments, The Great Escape, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, and The Wedding Singer.

Hobbies.

	Subcategories include Astrology, Board Games, and Food and Drink.

questions.correct: Sci/Tech & Sci Tech & Sci / Tech & Science/Technology
questions.explanation:
Sci/Tech & Sci Tech & Sci / Tech & Science/Technology.

	Subcategories range from Astronomy to Technology.

Animals.

	Subcategories include Dog Behavior, Pet Rodents, and Reptiles and Amphibians.

Celebrities.

	Subcategories include Celebs from TV, Fashion Celebs, and Film Stars.

General.

	Subcategories include Battle of the Sexes, Millionaire Style, and The Unexplained.

Music.

	Subcategories include the Monkees, James Taylor, and Who Sang This?

History.

	Subcategories include Canadian, Famous Dates, and Oceania.

Geography.

	Subcategories include Maps, Borders, and Names, New Zealand and the South Pacific, and World Cities.

Religion.

	Subcategories include Buddhism, Islam, and Wicca and Witchcraft.

Entertainment.

	Subcategories include Beauty Pageants, Las Vegas, and Coasters and Theme Parks. Thanks for taking the quiz. If you want to write in some quirky sub-sub-subcategories that you like, I'll add 'em in.
